mapper.insert: insert into db_uploadfile (SEQUENCEID, OPER, OPERTYPE, FLAG, PAYDATE, MOBILE, GROUPID, SMSFLAG, 'STATE', UPLOADTIME, RECORDNUM, SUCCESSNUM, ERRORNUM, PROCESSTIME, CORPID, SOURCETYPE, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, FILETYPE, SHOPITEMID, FILEURL, SUCCESSURL, ERRORURL, DESCR) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recordnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{successnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{errornum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{processtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourcetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{successurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{errorurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_uploadfile set OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTYPE = #{opertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAYDATE = #{paydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SMSFLAG = #{smsflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'STATE' = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPLOADTIME = #{uploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RECORDNUM = #{recordnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUCCESSNUM = #{successnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ERRORNUM = #{errornum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROCESSTIME = #{processtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCETYPE = #{sourcetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILETYPE = #{filetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPITEMID = #{shopitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILEURL = #{fileurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, SUCCESSURL = #{successurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ERRORURL = #{errorurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, OPER, OPERTYPE, FLAG, PAYDATE, MOBILE, GROUPID, SMSFLAG, 'STATE', UPLOADTIME, RECORDNUM, SUCCESSNUM, ERRORNUM, PROCESSTIME, CORPID, SOURCETYPE, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, FILETYPE, SHOPITEMID, FILEURL, SUCCESSURL, ERRORURL, DESCR from db_uploadfile where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, OPER, OPERTYPE, FLAG, PAYDATE, MOBILE, GROUPID, SMSFLAG, 'STATE', UPLOADTIME, RECORDNUM, SUCCESSNUM, ERRORNUM, PROCESSTIME, CORPID, SOURCETYPE, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, FILETYPE, SHOPITEMID, FILEURL, SUCCESSURL, ERRORURL, DESCR from db_uploadfile
